publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3308 Tommy Sheridan: Salary Level of Firefighters and Control Staff-That the Parliament declares its fullest support for the Fire Brigades Union campaign for a new Â£30,000 a year salary for firefighters and control staff without any reduction in hard won and important employment conditions.
S1M-3308 Salary Level of Firefighters and Control Staff (lodged on 19 August 2002) Dennis Canavan*, Mr John McAllion*, Elaine Smith*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*
